basics.name: Jihan Yang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: A highly motivated Data Science student with strong expertise in machine learning, natural language processing, and deep learning. Passionate about using technology to solve real-world challenges.

courses: INFO 103: Social Media, Ethics, and Automation
INFO 201: Foundational Skills for Data Science

work.name: GreenView Floors International Inc.
work.summary: Applied machine learning techniques to analyze customer interaction data and optimize business strategies.
highlights: Developed and implemented machine learning algorithms using Python and TensorFlow.
Automated data cleaning and clustering processes to improve data accessibility.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver actionable insights for user engagement.

work.name: University of Science and Technology of China
work.summary: Led a research project on natural language processing to develop a dialect translation model.
highlights: Designed a sequence-to-sequence neural network using TensorFlow.
Collected and standardized large volumes of text data for training and testing.
Improved model performance through iterative hyperparameter tuning.

work.name: Neusoft Corporation
work.summary: Automated testing of a car reservation system using Python to ensure reliability and robustness.
highlights: Developed Python scripts to automate regression testing and simulate edge cases.
Validated logical interactions between modules and ensured compliance with business rules.
Enhanced system reliability by identifying and addressing errors through log analysis.
